title: Unveiling the Top 10 Robotics Stories of September 2023
description: In the dynamic world of robotics, September 2023 has emerged as a crucial chapter, witnessing a cascade of technological triumphs that promise to reshape industries and redefine possibilities. From cutting-edge advancements in Generative AI shaping robot learning to substantial funding elevating the accessibility of robotics controllers, this month has been a whirlwind of innovation.  LimX ... title: Ripple secures significant digital payment license in Singapore
description: In a significant move for the fintech world, Ripple, the renowned blockchain-based payment protocol and digital currency platform, has announced that it has secured a comprehensive digital payment tokens license from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS). This development comes as a testament to Ripple’s growing influence in the global financial landscape and its commitment ... Read more
